title: Can I change my email without having to get a code off my original email
body: You see, my gmail got hijacked and I cannot access it. I don't remember any of the security questions to recover that password. Yet I need to get a confirmation code with that gmail... So is there a way I could get this handled?

replies.body: We can help!  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account recovery team can help update your info.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
